Item.name: Bagpipes
Item.description: An ancient instrument from earth consisting of an inflatable bladder, a mouthpiece and several metal pipes that produce haunting melodies.

Item.name: Toilet
Item.description: Relief yourself or get rid of something by flushing it down.

Item.name: Toilet
Item.description: Variant of the toilet to be used on outpost modules that can't be picked up and moved by the player.

Item.description: An empty aluminium can. Can be deconstructed into aluminium or thrown around.
